children.text: CRITICAL Check ! - If the Start Dates do not match with the Maint windows timings, Please contact the release team to investigate, use the Cancel Schedules button to stop schedules that havent started.
GSK Patching Process Schedule By Maintenance Windows
Please use the Table below to verify the timing of the patching windows for the Linux Patching Process.
Canceling will only stop schedules that have not started. If you need to stop executing patching please login to Tower and cancel running jobs.
Are you sure you want to Cancel the schedules for  Patching?
